Title: All Quiet on the Western Front
Description: A classic war film depicting the harrowing experiences of young soldiers during World War I.

Title: American Gangster
Description: A crime drama based on the true story of a drug lord and a determined detective in 1970s Harlem.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An underground fight club spirals into chaos, exploring the dark side of consumerism and identity.

Title: Grease
Description: A musical romantic comedy set in the 1950s, following the love story of Sandy and Danny.

Title: The Hunger Games
Description: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in a brutal televised fight for survival.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Description: Jane Austen's classic tale of love and manners in early 19th-century England.

Title: Shrek 2
Description: Shrek and Fiona visit Fiona's parents, leading to hilarious adventures in Far Far Away.

Title: Straight Outta Compton
Description: The rise and impact of the rap group N.W.A in the turbulent streets of Compton, California.

Title: The Two Popes
Description: A fictionalized account of the relationship between Pope Benedict XVI and Cardinal Jorge Bergoglio (Pope Francis).

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Description: The outrageous true story of Jordan Belfort's rise and fall as a stockbroker, filled with excess and corruption.
During World War I, two British soldiers are given a seemingly impossible mission: cross enemy lines to deliver a message that could save 1,600 lives.

Title: The Irishman
Description: A mob hitman recalls his involvement with the disappearance of Jimmy Hoffa, a powerful union leader, in this epic crime drama directed by Martin Scorsese.

Title: Inception
Description: A mind-bending science fiction thriller where a thief enters people's dreams to steal their deepest secrets.

Title: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Description: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed, leading to unexpected romantic adventures.
